Are any of these mods known for unloading EVERY SINGLE SHIP? Cos that's what just happened...
FusTek Station Parts from X0.04-4 onwards has unique internals for most of its station modules.
It the via mod for the mk2 space pod, I think that's what's it called please correct me if I am wrong

Are any of these mods known for unloading EVERY SINGLE SHIP? Cos that's what just happened...

If you've removed any mod parts that were being used on said ship will have that effect.

Yes, except that this removed the STOCK parts. I know what I'm doing...

Also it was the Cacteye telescope mod which did it. Today I tried it with a clean install and the game froze during loading.
